text: Azerbaijan Airlines Flight 8243 was a scheduled international passenger flight from Baku, Azerbaijan, to Grozny, Russia. On 25 December 2024, the flight crashed near Aqtau International Airport, Kazakhstan, with 62 passengers and 5 crew on board. Russian news agencies said that a cause for the crash was because of a bird strike. but initial investigations confirmed that a Russian missile caused the AZAL airplane crash. In total, 38 people died in the accident, including both pilots. 29 people survived. ==References== Category:December 2024 events
title: Azerbaijan Airlines Flight 8243
